pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:5.1: 28. The training rule on giving robes
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:6.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave monastic robes to performers, dancers, acrobats, magicians, and drummers, saying,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:6.5: “Venerable Thullanandā is a learned reciter; she’s confident and skilled at giving teachings.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:6.6: Give to her; work for her!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:7.2: “How can Venerable Thullanandā give monastic robes to lay people?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:7.6: How can the nun Thullanandā give monastic robes to lay people?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:8.1: ‘If a nun gives a monastic robe to a lay people or a male wanderer or a female wanderer, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:10.2: anyone who lives in a house.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:11.2: any male wanderer apart from Buddhist monks and novice monks.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:12.2: any female wanderer apart from Buddhist nuns, trainee nuns, and novice nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:13.2: a mark has been made is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:13.3: If she gives it away, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:14.2: if she gives one to her mother or father;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:14.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:15.1: The eighth training rule is finished.
